name: Rolex
description: A stunning black steel and rose-gold 18K 5N TAG Heuer Carrera Heuer 02 with black alligator and rubber strap. This 43mm automatic chronograph has a movement with 80 hours power reserve, which is visible through the sapphire case back.

name: Santos Dumont de Cartier
description: A classic style gets an update in a less common hue: gray. The subdued color and rose-gold frame will match any outfit.

name: Cape Cod Stainless Steel & Leather Strap Watch
description: The iconic Hermes double-wrap leather band goes incognito in matte black..

name: The Tilda Bracelet
description: Elevate your favorite jeans and t-shirt with this Tory Burch watch that doubles as your jewelry for the day.

name: La D de Dior Diamond
description: With a diamond case and pink mother-of-pearl face, this Dior watch is a total statement piece.

name: Gancino
description: This simple Ferragamo watch, may be delicate, but the sturdy shape and red leather band make it more modern than girly.

name: Chanel
description: This simple Ferragamo watch, may be delicate, but the sturdy shape and red leather band make it more modern than girly.

name: Breguet
description: A playful blue band and quirky numbers inject fun into an otherwise old-school watch brand.

name: Fossil
description: A playful blue band and quirky numbers inject fun into an otherwise old-school watch brand.

name: Blancpain
description: Adding a pastel watch band is an easy way to update a staple watch like Blancpain's Date.

name: Louis Vuitton
description: This simple style is spiced up with the iconic Louis Vuitton monogram.

name: Vacheron Constantin
description: An off-kilter face and bright red band create a watch with personality.

name: Harry Winston
description: Searching for a piece worth of heirloom status? Look no further than this ladylike design from Harry Winston.

name: Van Cleef & Arpels
description: Van Cleef’s classic Alhambra motif makes for a unique, yet beautiful watch; the number-free face keeps the design sleek.
